about_the_game:
The Karisvale Fan Pack is a way to support Brendan that includes:

Karisvale Official Soundtrack

5 high-quality audio tracks by Ananta Arora in the Berklee College of Music.

Articles About the Making Of

Learn about Karisvale's development process and the inspiration behind some of its imagery.

& some other random files I thought were worth throwing in.

How to Access

  1. Open Steam, go to the Library tab, and right-click on Karisvale in your game list.
  2. Select Properties and click the "Local Files" tab.
  3. Click "Browse Local Files..."
  4. Open the "Karisvale Fan Pack" folder.

    Thank you for the support, investigators.
detailed_description:
A Word From the Developer

Purchasing the Karisvale fan pack will help the project break even. The Fan Pack will receive random updates as I begin to document my creative process.

I've poured my heart and soul into Karisvale and it would mean so much to me if you took the time to play it, regardless of your decision to purchase this Fan Pack.

To show additional support, please consider following Karisvale on Twitter, spreading the word about Karisvale, and leaving a review on the Steam page.

  2. Select Properties and click the "Local Files" tab.
  3. Click "Browse Local Files..."
  4. Open the "Karisvale Fan Pack" folder.

    Thank you for the support, investigators.
name: Karisvale Fan Pack
short_description: The Karisvale Fan Pack is a way to support Brendan. Includes the official soundtrack and more.
